alert.note: Alert for Baker; Decatur; Early; Miller; Mitchell; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 8:08PM EDT until August 04 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Miller County in southwestern Georgia... Southwestern Mitchell County in southwestern Georgia... Southwestern Baker County in southwestern Georgia... Southern Early County in southwestern Georgia... Northern Seminole County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 808 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Donalsonville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Colquitt, Bainbridge, Donalsonville, West Bainbridge, Centerville, Iron City, Climax, Brinson, Jakin, Hanover, Ausmac, Babcock, Little Hope, Mayhaw, Decatur Co A/P, Boykin, Riverturn, Mimsville, Sharphagen and Donaldsonville A/P. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Decatur; Early; Miller; Mitchell; Seminole
